messages.subject: Re: any Halo 2 players?
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks, Deanna. My son Pat is a Halo 2 player, so I ve passed that on to him and he says he ll check it out. Bob ... gaming ... there ... some
messages.messageBody:
Thanks, Deanna. My son Pat is a Halo 2 player, so I've passed that on
to him and he says he'll check it out.

Bob


--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, "mamavegg" <pstujo@...> wrote:
>

> work due to Halo 3 coming out, and he and DS plan on a big-time
gaming

>
> They have been wondering about any other unschooling families out
there
> who might play Halo 2 online on XBox live, looking to connect with
some
> others to play. Their gamertags are AIVJO and Strelka1960. Any
> gamertags of unschoolers that they might look for?
>
> deanna
>

Yep, still active and this looks like just the ticket. Thanks!

deanna

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] any Halo 2 players?
messages.msgSnippet: -=-They have been wondering about any other unschooling families out there who might play Halo 2 online on XBox live, looking to connect with some others to
messages.messageBody:
-=-They have been wondering about any other unschooling families out
there
who might play Halo 2 online on XBox live, looking to connect with some
others to play. Their gamertags are AIVJO and Strelka1960. Any
gamertags of unschoolers that they might look for?-=-

There's a yahoo list for unschooling gamers. I think it's still
active (not positive), and it's listed and linked here:
http://sandradodd.com/lists/other

Holly used to play but she hasn't for months.

Sandra

messages.subject: any Halo 2 players?
messages.msgSnippet: My DS and DH are big Halo fans...in fact, DH took this week off from work due to Halo 3 coming out, and he and DS plan on a big-time gaming week! They have
messages.messageBody:
My DS and DH are big Halo fans...in fact, DH took this week off from
work due to Halo 3 coming out, and he and DS plan on a big-time gaming
week!

They have been wondering about any other unschooling families out there
who might play Halo 2 online on XBox live, looking to connect with some
others to play. Their gamertags are AIVJO and Strelka1960. Any
gamertags of unschoolers that they might look for?

deanna
